content.rendered:
Register now for our September Market Briefing Webinar for maritime & insurance professionals and join our experts who will be detailing first-hand experiences of our findings during ‘Shipshape©’ Risk Assessment Surveys. 

The webinar is scheduled for Thursday 10th September at 1300hrs UK.

AqualisBraemar surveyors have substantial experience in carrying out a wide variety of Warranty surveys, in particular, the ‘JH Surveys’. Special attention is given in assessing the risks undertaken by Underwriters, while our Surveyors act proactively for recommending rectification of defects and deficiencies, in order to mitigate such risks.

In this webinar we will be discussing:

  • Recent defects and deficiencies found to machinery, hull, navigation and safety equipment
  • Planned maintenance, spare parts carried, fuel oil and lubricating oil analysis

Long-standing Senior Surveyor John Oxenham based in the UAE will present the technical subject.

The session chairman will be Mark McGurran, Group MD of Marine Surveying & Consultancy, and the month’s casualty reports will be presented by Ashanti Storr, surveyor, from our New York office.

If you wish to attend this webinar, click here to register.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Webinar: October Marine Market Briefing
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Registration is now open for our October Market Briefing Webinar for maritime and insurance professionals. Join our experts who will look at the challenges arising from the Covid-19 pandemic and the consequences it has had for marine warranty surveys on current and future projects. The webinar is scheduled for Thursday…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Webinar: December Marine Market Briefing
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Registration is now open for our December Market Briefing Webinar for maritime and insurance professionals. Join our experts who will look at semi-submersible and heavy lift ships, focusing on design features, uses and risk factors.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Webinar: August Marine Market Briefing
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Register now for our August Market Briefing Webinar for maritime & insurance professionals and join our experts who will be discussing the current status of the Salvage Market and new developments in this sector.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Webinar - July Marine Market Briefing
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Register for our July Market Briefing for the maritime and maritime insurance sectors, our experts will be presenting on shiprepair & shipbuilding in Turkey, specifically the development of the shipyards in the Tuzla and Yalova area.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Marine Casualty Market Briefing Webinar - Vessel Lay-up and Reactivation
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Join AqualisBraemar Marine experts for our Market Briefing webinar at 3:30pm GMT on Thursday 9th April 2020.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Meet the Team: Romen Cross
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: “I am the US West Coast engineering surveyor, based in the Seattle area. I typically work up and down the coast, along with Mexico, Western Canada, Hawaii, and Alaska.”
